channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-1850] Test jdbcapi/SURTest_ij.sql fails on IBM WCTME 5.7 Foundation (jdkJ2ME Foundation Specification v1.0)
item.description:
The diff for the test is:

      • Start: SURTest_ij jdkJ2ME Foundation Specification v1.0 derbyall:jdbcapi 2006-09-10 12:51:18 ***
        1 del
        < CONNECTION0* - jdbc:derby:SURTest
        2 del
        < * = current connection
        2a1
        > java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: java.lang.NullPointerException
        4 del
        < WARNING 01J01: Database 'SURTest' not created, connection made to existing database instead.
        5 del
        < ij(CONNECTION1)> autocommit off;
        6 del
        < ij(CONNECTION1)> create table t1 (c1 int primary key, c2 int);
        6a3,4
        > ij> autocommit off;
        > ij> create table t1 (c1 int primary key, c2 int);
        8 del
        < ij(CONNECTION1)> insert into t1 values
        8a6
        > ij> insert into t1 values
        12 del
        < ij(CONNECTION1)> get scroll insensitive cursor sc1 as 'SELECT * FROM t1 FOR UPDATE';
        13 del
        < ij(CONNECTION1)> next sc1;
        13a10,11
        > ij> get scroll insensitive cursor sc1 as 'SELECT * FROM t1 FOR UPDATE';
        > ij> next sc1;
        17 del

item.summary: Test jdbcapi/SURTest_ij.sql fails on IBM WCTME 5.7 Foundation (jdkJ2ME Foundation Specification v1.0)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
fixed in trunk by commit http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=476588:

  • added the required ij.dataSource settings
  • added sedding of first CONNECTION line, to avoid extra master

M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/tests/jdbcapi/SURTest_ij_app.properties
AM java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/tests/jdbcapi/SURTest_ij_sed.properties

Missed updating the file DerbyNetClient/SURTest_ij.out.
(hurray for the tinderbox).

fixed on trunk with:
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=476645:
Sending java\testing\org\apache\derbyTesting\functionTests\master\DerbyNetClient\SURTest_ij.out

fixed on 10.2 branch with:
Sending java\testing\org\apache\derbyTesting\functionTests\master\DerbyNe
tClient\SURTest_ij.out
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=476648
